short_summary: Construction of artificial reefs in Kegaska on North Shore
description: Detailed description of the tender including scope of work and requirements
full_summary:
## Articial Reef Construction - Request for Proposal

### Reference Number:
**CB-5653-32862831**

### Solicitation Number:
**30004292**

### Abstract
Pêches et Océans Canada (Fisheries and Oceans Canada) invites prospective bidders to submit a proposal for the Artificial Reef Construction project in Kegaska, Quebec, Canada. The project involves construction of artificial reefs on North Shore for lobster habitat creation. The scope of work includes supply and installation of different stone sizes for seven (7) artificial reefs, hiring a diving company to verify compliance, and a multi-beam bathymetric survey.

### Notice Details

- **Reason for solicitation:** The government is seeking the most cost-effective solution to build artificial reefs for lobster habitat creation.
- **Estimated contract value:** The contract is expected to be valued at CAD (Canadian dollar), as per the request for proposal (RFP) documents.
- **Project milestones:**
    - **Expected start date:** 30th of June 2023
    - **Expected end date:** 30th of August 2023

### Documents to be reviewed

A complete set of Request for Proposal (RFP) documents, including all addenda and amendments, is available on the Government of Canada Buying Centre Portal (https://canadabuys.canada.ca) at the following URL: [link].

All interested bidders must register and create a profile on the Buying Centre Portal, then click 'Bid Now' on the tender page to receive the documents.
 
### Communication

For further information and clarification, please contact:
- **Name: Sara Gould**
- **Email:** sara.gould@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 0 (506) 470-6349

### Closing Date
Submissions must be received by 13:00 on the 22nd of June 2023. All bid submissions must be received in electronic format as per the instructions outlined in the RFP documents. Late or incomplete submissions will not be eligible for consideration. 

Note: The contractor was not paid and the tender deadline has expired, this is why the teaser shows an same expired status. 

Let me know if you like this work. Do you need further assistance? Have any specific questions? I'll do my best to help.

Also, I would suggest that you embed the links to the documents or provide a static link, so in the demo description, I ended up including only the relevant information and the attachments
